channel.title: Comments on: “Redemption is . . . rotating crops, spreading manure”?

item.title: By: Ron Miller
item.dc:creator: Ron Miller
item.description: GREAT stuff. Thanks for pointing to this.
item.content:encoded: GREAT stuff. Thanks for pointing to this.

item.title: By: Richard Barcellos
item.dc:creator: Richard Barcellos
item.description: Redeeming cursed dirt is the job of the ascended Redeemer of God’s elect and He will do that without our help when He does the same to our bodies (Rom. 8:18-25).
item.content:encoded: Redeeming cursed dirt is the job of the ascended Redeemer of God’s elect and He will do that without our help when He does the same to our bodies (Rom. 8:18-25).
